dmca.title: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity
dmca.body:
_____  

From: T2AntiPiracy02 [mailto:Internet2@take2-Antipiracy.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 13, 2005 7:36 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Demand for Immediate Take Down - Notice of Infringing Activity
Importance: High



VIA EMAIL: 

Demand for Immediate Take-Down: Notice of Infringing Activity 

URL: http://www.torrenttyphoon.com/default.aspx?q=andreas
<http://www.torrenttyphoon.com/default.aspx?q=andreas&cat=> &cat= 

13 June 2005 

Dear Sir or Madam, 

Take 2 has received information that the domain listed above, which appears
to be on servers under your control, is offering unlicensed copies of, or is
engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to copyrighted computer
games published by Take 2.

1. Identification of copyrighted works: 

Computer game(s): 
Xbox: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas 
PC: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas 

Copyright owner: 
Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc 

2. Infringing material or activity found at the following location(s):
http://www.torrenttyphoon.com/default.aspx?q=andreas
<http://www.torrenttyphoon.com/default.aspx?q=andreas&cat=> &cat=

The above Computer game(s) is being made available for copying, through
downloading, at the above location without authorization of the copyright
owner.

3. Statement of authority: 

I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that the information in this
notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of Take 2, the
owner of the copyright(s) in the work(s) identified above. I have a good
faith belief that none of the materials or activities listed above have been
authorized by Take 2, its agents, or the law.

We hereby give notice of these activities to you and request that you take
expeditious action to remove or disable access to the material described
above, and thereby prevent the illegal reproduction and distribution of this
computer game via your company's network. 

We appreciate your cooperation in this matter. Please advise us regarding
what actions you take. 

Yours sincerely, 

James Young 
Internet Investigator 

on behalf of Take-Two Interactive Software, Inc 
622 Broadway 
New York, NY 10012 
United States of America 

E-mail: internet1@take2-antipiracy.com
